title: TOWIE's Georgia Kousoulou and Chloe Sims opt for chic leather-look trousers
text:
They are two of the longest-standing cast members left.

And TOWIE stars Georgia Kousoulou and Chloe Sims are still working hard on the show as they were seen stepping out in style for filming on Tuesday.

The stunners, aged 28 and 36 respectively, donned similar ensembles as they both went low-key in casual get-ups complete with a white colour scheme.

Happy days: TOWIE stars Georgia Kousoulou and Chloe Sims are still working hard on the show as they were seen stepping out in style for filming on Tuesday

Georgia was showing off her eye-popping bust in a tight cream vest top which was tucked in to her leather look leggings.

Chloe meanwhile covered up in a baggy white T-shirt with the words: 'I see you, I see you, I see you', written on the back.

The outing comes after Chloe was spotted leaving Chiltern Firehouse on Saturday alongside non other than Pamela Anderson's ex, Adil Rami, 33,

A source told MailOnline the pair were on a first date, with Adil flying in especially from France to take Chloe out.

Shocker: The star kept a low profile upon leaving the venue with the French footballer, who had an acrimonious, highly-publicised split from Pamela, 52, this summer

The star kept a low profile upon leaving the venue with the French footballer, who had an acrimonious, highly-publicised split from Pamela, 52, this summer.

The pair hopped into a cab together following their evening at the exclusive venue, keeping a low profile as they sat side-by-side in the back seat.

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Chloe and for Adil for comment.

Here they come! Chloe was joined by her on-off pal Joey Turner in their native Essex

Chloe has been single since her ill-fated relationship with Dan Edgar, which played out on our screens on the last series of the ITVBe reality show.

Elsewhere, Chloe Brockett, who has been at the heart of the drama on this season's TOWIE, was putting her woes in the past on Tuesday as she stepped out with her on-off pal Joey Turner in their native Essex.

The starlet, 18, nailed autumnal chic in a flirty patterned mini skirt with a furry jacket while boosting her height with stylish ankle boots.
